entry.string: oc process -f https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sogis/pipelines/master/api_webgisclient/api-gateway/deploymentconfig.yaml -p NAMESPACE=gdi-test -p TAG=2.0.25 -p REPLICAS=1 -p CPU_REQUEST=0 -p CPU_LIMIT=0 -p MEMORY_REQUEST=0 -p MEMORY_LIMIT=0 -p ENVIRONMENT=-test -p LOADBALANCE=false -p SSL=false | oc apply -n gdi-test -f- oc rollout latest -n gdi-test api-gateway oc rollout status -n gdi-test dc api-gateway
